Welcome to the St. Petersburg-Widget


You need to be authenticated to play.
This is simple, the authentication works by joining this room:

The Widget will check if you have joined this room and you can play. This serves two purposes:

  • First, I can estimate how many people use this widget. If this exceeds the realm of a tech demo and is a competitor to official platforms I can inform the publisher and a solution can be found.
  • The second advantage is, that the authentication-room can also be used to quickly ask for help or serach for ppl to play with!
Trouble shooting guide In case things dont work there are multiple things to check.
  • Have you granted the widget all the required permissions? This is necassary to read the auth rooms state and check if you joined that room.
  • On Android the widget api to communicate with the client/ask read and sent room events is not yet supported.
  • When adding this widget to a room the "change room settings permission" must be allowed for all participating memebers, so that they can update the room stat, which is required to make a turn in the game.
    The easiest solution for this is to set the group for change settings to Default : Room settings -> Permission and roles -> change settings
